pr_title: Fix parsing of character ranges involving hex literals

timeline.bodyText: The non-compliant comment is not correctly ending.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.message:
Fix parsing of character ranges involving hex literals

Also add support for hex literals for rules S5869 and S5857.

Fix parsing of character ranges involving hex literals

Also add support for hex literals for rules S5869 and S5857.
